alternateName: Extraction Protocol for Sterivex Filters - eDNA Extraction Based on Qiagen DNeasy Blood & Tissue Kit
description: Protocol for extracting environmental DNA (eDNA) from water samples collected on Sterivex filters, using the Qiagen DNeasy Blood & Tissue Kit. Includes detailed procedures for clean lab entry, filter processing, lysis, and DNA purification over a 2-day workflow.
keywords: eDNA; DNA extraction; Sterivex filters; Qiagen DNeasy; environmental DNA; water samples; marine genomics
name: RGG DNA extraction protocol for water samples (eDNA)
